events.name: ReportGenerated
events.description: Triggered when a new report is successfully created.

events.name: ReportUpdated
events.description: Occurs when an existing report is modified.

events.name: ReportDeleted
events.description: Fires when a report is removed from the system.

events.name: ReportFetched
events.description: Triggered when a report is accessed or retrieved.

commands.name: GenerateReport
commands.description: Triggered when a new report is successfully created.

commands.name: UpdateReport
commands.description: Occurs when an existing report is modified.

commands.name: DeleteReport
commands.description: Fires when a report is removed from the system.

commands.name: FetchReport
commands.description: Triggered when a report is accessed or retrieved.

integrationPoints.name: DataWarehouseIntegration
integrationPoints.description: Integration with Data Warehouse for pulling in analytics data.

integrationPoints.name: SalesSystemIntegration
integrationPoints.description: Integration with Sales System to gather sales data for reports.

integrationPoints.name: UserManagementIntegration
integrationPoints.description: Integration for user authentication and authorization.
